attributes.action: Calling David Cameron to use his full power in order to get the Union Flag back up over Belfast
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned request that David Cameron and all Parties related use their powers in order for The Union Flag be hoisted up above Belfast where it belongs.

The Union Flag should never have been taken down for any reason and it has been left down for long enough now.

Get the flag forced back up if needed, this is our history and culture and we will not accept it being taken down.
